# CoreX security - tls

This package provides an implementation of the CoreX security interface for tls.

## Installation
~~~bash
pip install corex-security-tls
~~~

## Usage
~~~python
from corex_security_tls.handler import TlsHandler
handler = TlsHandler()
handler.example_method()
~~~
